body:
Sorry, I was not able to construct a reproducer that does not depend on being in tests. However, [this code](http://play.golang.org/p/rQ4pxcKo_L) reproduces the failure if it is used to replace the covariancematrix_test.go file in github.com/gonum/stat.

Run using `go test -cpuprofile foo.prof`.

(github.com/gonum/blas/cblas is installed using OpenBLAS).
